Key Match Events: Adil Rashid took his first wicket of the tournament and allowed Sri Lanka just 16 off his four overs without conceding a single boundary.
Chris Woakes, Sam Curran, and Ben Stokes each took one wicket.
England restricted Sri Lanka to 141 for eight in Sydney.
Dawid Malan walked off the field in the 15th over after pulling up sharply and appearing to clutch his groin.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jos Buttler’s side needed to win their final Super 12s game to oust hosts and defending champions Australia from second spot in the group and progress to the knockout stages alongside New Zealand.
Sri Lanka, who cannot finish in the top two, amassed just five fours and one six after the seventh over as England adjusted their tactics on a used pitch with lopsided square boundaries.
